suggestedNewContent.title: The Library vs Cloud Documents Analogy
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Compare offline-first to having books at home (always accessible) vs checking out from library (network dependent). Explain how offline-first gives you both local copies and sync capability.

suggestedNewContent.title: Common Offline-First Pitfalls
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover: 1) Storage limits on mobile devices, 2) Data staleness issues, 3) Conflict resolution complexity, 4) Security/encryption requirements for local data, 5) Increased app complexity

suggestedNewContent.title: When NOT to Use Offline-First
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain scenarios where online-first is better: real-time collaborative apps, security-sensitive data that shouldn't be stored locally, apps requiring always-fresh data (stock prices, live scores)
